results.title: Follow the fleet
results.creator_credit: Mark Sandrich, Pandro S. Berman and RKO Radio Pictures
results.brief_description: Based on Hubert Osborne’s play “Shore leave”, this romantic comedy musical features that wonderful dancing duo, Fred Astaire as Bake Baker, a sailor, and Ginger Rogers as Sherry Martin, a dance-hall hostess. Although playing more of a supportive role to Randolph Scott and Harriet Hilliard, the Fred and Ginger team put in an unforgettable performance with “Let’s face the music and dance”. Cast also includes Betty Grable and Lucille Ball. Lyrics and music by Irving Berlin.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mark Sandrich, Pandro S. Berman and RKO Radio Pictures
results.description: Based on Hubert Osborne’s play “Shore leave”, this romantic comedy musical features that wonderful dancing duo, Fred Astaire as Bake Baker, a sailor, and Ginger Rogers as Sherry Martin, a dance-hall hostess. Cast also includes Betty Grable and Lucille Ball. Lyrics and music by Irving Berlin.

results.title: Violin and viola
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode no. 1 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. In this film the professional musicians show how the violin and viola are played, demonstrate their range and tone, and show how to care for them

results.title: The French horn
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and music lover. In the film professional musicians demonstrate total range, method of playing and care of the French Horn.

results.title: Tuned percussion
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 10 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. Professional musicians show how each instrument of the percussion group is played, demonstrate their range and tone, and show how to care for these instruments.

results.title: Trumpet and cornet
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
Part of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. Professional musicians, Glenn Madden and Gary Foot, demonstrate how the trumpet and the cornet are played, their range and tone, and show how to care for these instruments.
